title: Michelle Knotek // 93
description:
*In the 1990's and early 2000's, three people went missing while staying at a family home in Washington state and seemingly vanished without a trace. But each time police would go to the house, the homeowners had a perfectly reasonable explanation for their whereabouts, along with proof. So, what happened to these people? This is the story of Michelle Knotek.* *BONUS EPISODES: patreon.com/goingwestpodcast* *KEFLA ORGANICS CBD: Use code GOINGWEST20 for 20% off your order at keflaorganics.com* *CASE SOURCES:* https://www.the-sun.com/lifestyle/876416/shelly-knotek-abuse-daughters-serial-killer/ https://murderpedia.org/male.K/k/knotek-david.htm ( https://murderpedia.org/male.K/k/knotek-david.htm ) https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/119827321/kathy-loreno https://murderpedia.org/female.K/k/knotek-michelle.htm https://peoplepill.com/people/michelle-knotek/ https://www.karisable.com/skazknotec.htm https://meaww.com/serial-killer-michelle-shelly-knotek-biggest-manipulator-daughter-tortured-killed-friends-family https://caselaw.findlaw.com/wa-court-of-appeals/1430291.html Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
